name: Aurora Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: An AURORA file is a file encrypted by the Aurora Virus, a trojan horse utilized by cybercriminals. It contains a user's file, such as a .WMV , .MP4 , .XLSX , or .PDF file, encrypted with the 2048 bit RSA key. AURORA files became prevalent in 2018 and are similar to .LOCKY and .ODIN files.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
